short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension offering a overview of project status, including page details, recently updated components and local vs live preview.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ARX Dev Tools is a powerful Chrome extension tailored for developers, offering a streamlined, interactive way to get real-time insights into üì¶project status during development.

ARX Dev Tools is primarily designed to support Khoros and Aurora customizations, providing specialized tools and insights for these platforms.

With features designed for convenience and clarity, ARX Dev Tools provides:

@ Information about page details
